thread.title: MLB 2015: Rangers clinch AL West; Yankees vs. Astros, Pirates vs. Cubs in wild-card games
thread.title_full: MLB 2015: Rangers clinch AL West; Yankees vs. Astros, Pirates vs. Cubs in wild-card games | AL.com

author: Creg Stephenson | cstephenson@al.com
title: MLB 2015: Rangers clinch AL West; Yankees vs. Astros, Pirates vs. Cubs in wild-card games
text:
The 2015 MLB regular season concluded Sunday, and the playoff pairings are now set.
The Texas Rangers beat the Los Angeles Angels 9-2 behind a complete game from Cole Hamels, clinching the American League West title. The Rangers will meet the Toronto Blue Jays in a best-of-5 division series beginning Thursday in Toronto, while the Angels are eliminated.
The AL wild-card game will feature the Houston Astros against the New York Yankees Tuesday in New York (7 p.m., ESPN). Both teams lost Sunday — the Yankees 9-4 to Baltimore and the Astros 5-3 to Arizona — but New York finished one game ahead of Houston in the final standings.
The Kansas City Royals clinched the No. 1 AL playoff seed with a 6-1 win over Minnesota, coupled with the Toronto Blue Jays' 12-3 loss to Tampa Bay. The Royals await the Houston-New York winner in the division series.
The Pittsburgh Pirates shut out the Cincinnati Reds 4-0 Sunday to clinch the first NL wild-card. The Pirates will host the Chicago Cubs on Wednesday night (7 p.m. Central, TBS), with the winner advancing to meet the St. Louis Cardinals in the division series.
The other NL playoff matchup is the New York Mets vs. the Los Angeles Dodgers. Game 1 of that series is Friday in Los Angeles.
Here is the complete MLB playoff schedule for the wild-card round and division series (all times Central):
Tuesday, Oct. 6
AL wild-card game: Astros at Yankees, 7 p.m., ESPN
Wednesday, Oct. 7
NL wild-card game: Cubs at Pirates, 7 p.m., TBS
Thursday, Oct. 8
ALDS Game 1: Wild-card winner at Royals, time & TV TBD
ALDS Game 1: Rangers at Blue Jays, time & TV TBD
Friday, Oct. 9
NLDS Game 1: Mets at Dodgers, time TBD, TBS
NLDS Game 1: Wild-card winner at Cardinals, time TBD, TBS
ALDS Game 2: Wild-card winner at Royals, time & TV TBD
ALDS Game 2: Rangers at Blue Jays, time & TV TBD
Saturday, Oct. 10
NLDS Game 2: Mets at Dodgers, time TBD, TBS
NLDS Game 2: Wild-card winner at Cardinals, time TBD, TBS
Sunday, Oct. 11
ALDS Game 3: Wild-card winner at Royals, time & TV TBD
ALDS Game 3: Rangers at Blue Jays, time & TV TBD
Monday, Oct. 12
NLDS Game 3: Mets at Dodgers, time TBD, TBS
NLDS Game 3: Wild-card winner at Cardinals, time TBD, TBS
ALDS Game 4 (if necessary): Wild-card winner at Royals, time & TV TBD
ALDS Game 4 (if necessary): Rangers at Blue Jays, time & TV TBD
Tuesday, Oct. 13
NLDS Game 4 (if necessary): Mets at Dodgers, time TBD, TBS
NLDS Game 4 (if necessary): Wild-card winner at Cardinals, time TBD, TBS
Wednesday, Oct. 14
ALDS Game 5 (if necessary): Wild-card winner at Royals, time & TV TBD
ALDS Game 5 (if necessary): Rangers at Blue Jays, time & TV TBD
Thursday, Oct. 15
NLDS Game 5 (if necessary): Mets at Dodgers, time TBD, TBS
NLDS Game 5 (if necessary): Wild-card winner at Cardinals, time TBD, TBS
